summary: The module implements the core high‑level API of the Lark parsing library. It builds lexer and parser components from an EBNF grammar, offers methods to parse input strings, produce parse trees, and step through parsing interactively. It also defines a configuration container for parsing options and a helper for post‑lexical token processing.
business_intent: Provide developers with an easy-to-use interface for defining grammars and parsing text, facilitating the creation of domain‑specific languages, data extraction tools, and any software that requires syntactic analysis of structured input.
